title: Analysis of a quartic function part - b

content.description: Let f be the function given byf(x)=3x4 + x3−21x2 .
content.question: Find the absolute minimum value of f. Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

frqParts.text: Find the absolute minimum value of f. Show the analysis that leads to your conclusion.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
